enb_long_title: The Consultative Group of Experts (CGE) on National Communications from Non-Annex I Parties
sentences: On Wednesday, 10 April, participants heard presentations of the CGE task group reports on greenhouse gas inventories; vulnerability and adaptation assessment (V&A) and research and systematic observation (RSO); abatement; education, training and public awareness (ETPA); and crosscutting issues.
These presentations focused on those national communications submitted following the Panama workshop in March 2001, and before 31 December 2001.
